data.text: @nzherald So @AshBloomfield can make out more are dying from COVID?  https://t.co/3WqfR5p3hA
@Bro90 @nzherald Bloomfield stated he doesn’t have the evidence so he shouldn’t be making assumption’s. It’s that simple. He’s the Director-General of Health, not you.

@nzherald The way the daily figures for Covid are given it seems like we have thousands and thousands of cases. What is not given are the recovery numbers. No wonder so many people are saying what a great big lie the whole thing is.

@Bro90 @Sarahja33158481 @nzherald I really wish it wasn’t true.
Yes 33,000 people die in Nz each year.
Each death is a very sad event
73 of flu in 2019
the govt said 34 died of covid, 81 “with”
People should be allowed to chose what goes in their body, not coerced 
The state does not own us
I wish you well

@Maorikiwi13 @Bro90 @Sarahja33158481 @nzherald O wow
I’m so sorry to hear
15 is incredibly young
Many many condolences ❤️

@Bro90 @Sarahja33158481 @nzherald That’s why I said “up to”
The cause of Many deaths have not been confirmed Which is very unusual
Furthermore adverse reports are often understated
Have you read the Pfizer report.?
Good luck to you
Drink the fear coolade she’s dishing out, Jab up & stick your head in the sand

@Bro90 @Sarahja33158481 @V40460101 @nzherald my 15 yr old niece was 1 of those statistics ... I feel for all our loved ones that were taken too soon 💔 
#theABCsofcullingaNATION
